title: Razer Blade Pro 17 - Unboxing The Best 17" Notebook Of 2019?
description: The new Razer Blade Pro 17 2019 has finally made it into our hands and we decided to let you know some quick first impressions before the actual review.  Count this as more of an unveiling rather than an unboxing since there isn't much to talk about in the box.    Buy items in this video from Amazon at the links below:  Cooler Master MM830:    Subscribe    Review unit provided free of charge byRaqzer. This video is sponsored by Cooler Master and an off voice. As per Hardware Canucks guidelines, no review direction was received from manufacturer.  As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases.   Gear list (Available on Amazon):  Main Camera -  Main Lens -  Main Camera Mic -  Second Camera -  $700 Camera (Panasonic G7) -  Sigma 18-35mm F1.8 -  Cinevate DUZI Slider -  AKG C314 -  AKG C 568 B -  Zoom H5 -  ------------------------------------------------------------ Our full site:  Join Our Forums:   Follow us for more updates! Twitter  FaceBook  Instagram  -------------------------------------------------------  #razerbladepro17 #gamingnotebook #hardwarecanucks
